Package com.example.androidgpt_pro

Class EventDatabaseControl

java.lang.Object
com.example.androidgpt_pro.EventDatabaseControl
public class EventDatabaseControl extends Object
This is a class that controls the interaction between event data and the database.

    • addEventSignUpProfile

      public void addEventSignUpProfile(String eventID, String profileID)
      This is an adder used to add the given profile ID to the event sign up list.
      Parameters:
      eventID - eventID: An ID of an event.
      profileID - profileID: An ID of a profile.

    • delEventSignUpProfile

      public void delEventSignUpProfile(String eventID, String profileID)
      This is a deleter that can remove profile that want to cancel sign up.
      Parameters:
      eventID - eventID: An ID of an event.
      profileID - profileID: An ID of a profile.

    • getEventAllCheckInProfiles

      public String[][] getEventAllCheckInProfiles(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot eventDocumentSnapshot)
      This is a getter for Event CheckIn Profiles.
      Parameters:
      eventDocumentSnapshot - eventDocumentSnapshot: An event document snapshot.
      Returns:
      eventCheckInProfiles eventCheckInProfiles: A "2D Array" list of profileID and count, list[0][0] == "-1" if no profiles.

    • addEventCheckInProfile

      public void addEventCheckInProfile(String eventID, String profileID)
      This is an adder used to add or update the given profileID to the event check in list.
      Parameters:
      eventID - eventID: An event's ID.
      profileID - profileID: An profile's ID.
